attributes.action: Block military intervention in Syria. No Verifiable evidence of chemical attack.
attributes.additional_details: Not in the national interest to embark on another military overthrow of a middle eastern regime and potentially enter a war with Russia.
attributes.background: It has been shown that previous allegations of chemical attacks by middle east regimes have either been fabricated or instigated by rebels and not in fact, as unsubstaniatedly reported in mainstream media. Assad is crushing ISIS and has no motive to use chemical weapons and invite US-backed strikes.
